question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Single Parameters, One Step and One Shot
question_sets.description: Simple, single step questions designed to test the capability of selection of records based on some criteria.

questions.question: Among the top 30 rated albums, which were released by 'Radiohead'? Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums': [album_names_by_Radiohead_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (string matching).

questions.question: Which songs released in 2012 were performed by more than 1 artist? Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [names_of_songs_released_in_2012_with_multiple_artists_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (integer interval matching).

questions.question: Among all Eminem albums, which has the highest number of ratings? Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'my_album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (max. integer).

questions.question: Among all top 10 albums, which have between 20000 and 50000 ratings? Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (interval of large integer bounds).

albums: The Black Saint and the Sinner Lady
In the Court of the Crimson King
The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders From Mars

questions.question: What is the 8th highest rated 'Alt-Pop' album? Return the answer in JSON format:{'8th_highest_rated_album':'album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small floating point number).

target.comment: Small integer/floating values may provide problems for selection

questions.question: Among the 15 songs with the longest durations, what is the most popular song? Return the answer in JSON format:{'most_popular_song':'song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small floating point number).

questions.question: Among the songs released in 2020, which one has the 2nd most streams? Return the answer in JSON format:{'song':'song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (large integer).

questions.question: Among the 15 most streamed songs, which were released between January 2023 and Februray 2023? Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on interval (date range)

questions.question: Among all Wonky albums, which album with more than 6 genres has the highest average rating? Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'album_name_here'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on niche genre identification and on interval (integer).

questions.question: What is the 20th most popular song? Return the answer in JSON format:{'20th_most_popular_song':'song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (last record only - ignore rest).

questions.question: Among the 10 longest songs, which were released by 'Eminem'? Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[song_names_of_Eminem_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (string match).

question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Multiple Parameters, Single Step and One Shot
question_sets.description: Simple single step questions designed to test the capability of selection of records based on some criteria with multi parameter functions.

questions.question: What is the album with the second highest average rating among albums released between 2000 and 2001? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'second_highest_av_rating_album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small floating point number)

answer.album: Lift Yr. Skinny Fists Like Antennas to Heaven!

questions.question: Among all 'Wonky' but not 'Deconstructed Club'and 'Hip Hop' albums,which has the highest rating? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'highest_rated_album_name_here'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset. Identify genres correctly, identify elements (genres) in list.

questions.question: Among all 'Wonky' but not 'Deconstructed Club','Nu Jazz' and 'Hip Hop' albums, which albums have a review count below 20? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums': [album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (count items in list, select by integer bound).

albums: Things Don't Always Go the Way You Plan

questions.question: What television genre albums were released in 2023 with a rating lower than 3.0? Please provide only album(s) name.Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums': [album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (small floating point number).

questions.question: Among the top 3 songs of Coldplay, which one was released in 2002? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'song':'song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (date).

questions.question: Which albums released between June 2020 and Aug. 2020 are by Taylor Swift?  Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'album_name_here'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (date range).

questions.question: Among all the non-explitic songs with a dancability of 90 or more, what song has the longest duration?  Please provide only song(s) nameReturn the answer in JSON format: {'song':'song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (min. small floating point number).

questions.question: Among all the non-explitic songs with a dancability of 90 or more, what songs have a duration over 3 minutes?  Please provide only song(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: What are the non-explicit songs with a danceability over 85 percent, and speechiness over 10% that has a duration over 4 minutes? Please provide only song(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: Which Hip Hop album was released in 2000, and contains 'vulgar' language? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on identifying vulgar as descriptor (and not genre).

albums: Chocolate Starfish and the Hot Dog Flavored Water

questions.question: Provide me those songs from top 10 songs of Taylor Swift released in 2022, which have bpm in the range of 80-110. Please provide only song(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (integer range).

questions.question: Return albums with ratings between 3.0 and 3.5 from a list of melodic, poetic albums in the Indie Folk genre released in 2020. Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: Among the top 5 songs released by SZA in 2022, which songs have the most similarity based on BPM? Please provide only song(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on similarity (reasoning;  larger integer and very close).

questions.question: Which album is released between 2000 and 2002, contains Hip Hop but not Metal and has a rating of 3.9 or more? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on date, genres and floating point arguments.

questions.question: Which explicit songs with a speechiness of 50%, energy of 50% and bpm of 100 have a duration between 2.75 and 3.5 minutes? Please provide only song(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[speechiness_song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: Which albums released in 2000, have a minimum of 5000 ratings, with at least an average rating of 3.5 and a minimum of 200 reviews, and rock as genre? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums': [album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (genres).

albums: Lift Yr. Skinny Fists Like Antennas to Heaven!

questions.question: Which albums are released between 2000 and 2002, contain Hip Hop but not Metal and have a rating of 3.85 or more? Please provide only album(s) name. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based identifying genres, and dates and returning all records.

questions.question: Get the list of albums released in 1988 with min rating 3.5 and reviewed by more than 200 and rated by minimum 5000 persons. From this list, only provide those album names that are of type Progressive Metal. Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums':[album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (string matching in list of items per record).

albums: Seventh Son of a Seventh Son

questions.question: Two songs can have same acousticness percentages. Considering the previous first sentence, which 2 explicit songs with a speechiness of 40, energy of 30% and bpm of 120 with an allowed difference of 25 are the most similar to each other based on acousticness? Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs':[two_sameacousticness_song_names_here], 'acousticness_%':acousticness_percentage_here}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (same parameter value matching).

question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Multi Step and One Shot for Sequential Function Calling
question_sets.description: Simple, multi step questions designed to test the capability of selection of records based on some criteria using sequential function calling

questions.question: Among all the albums of Kanye West, return the album with the maximum rating. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'my_album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of data based on a defined criteria (max. integer/float).

questions.question: A very famous artist of US, couldn’t recall his name, whose song is 'Mockingbird' is one of my favourites.  Can you find his name and please return his all albums that are rated above 2.5. Return the answer in JSON format: {'name_of_artist':'artist_name', 'albums': [album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (above threshold)

questions.question: Among the albums with rating > 3.5 and minimum number of rating as 30000, select the album released in 2022 and provide the songs of that album. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (date).

questions.question: Provide me the album with the third lowest number of reviews of the same artist as that of 'Ray of Light'. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'3rd_least_reviewed_album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria

questions.question: I like songs with high beats, my friend recommended an artist and his albums, but I only remember the name of album “Oasis”. Can you please provide the songs of this artist with bpm in the range of 120-160. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of data based on a defined criteria (interval of integer bounds).

questions.question: I loved the song 'City of Gods'. Give me all songs released by the same artist ordered from older to newer excluding 'City of Gods'. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [ordered_song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of data based on a defined criteria (sorting and exclusion of song).

question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Multi Step and One Shot for Parallel Function Calling.
question_sets.description: Simple, multi step questions designed to test the capability of selection of records based on some criteria using parallel function calling

questions.question: Among the albums released in 2000 and 10 years apart in 2010, return the ones with 5 or more genres.Return the answer in JSON format: {'albums': [album_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of data based on niche genre identification.

questions.question: Among all the songs of Justin Bieber and Bad Bunny, can you please provide the songs with bpm in the range of 120-160. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [specified_bpm_range_song_names_here]}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of data based on a defined criteria (interval of integer bounds).

questions.question: Among the albums of Ed Sheeran and Olivia Rodrigo, return the album with the highest number of reviews. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album': 'highest_reviewed_album_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of data based on criterion (max. number).

questions.question: My two favourite songs of Taylor Swift are 'Maroon' and 'Shake It Off'. Which one is streamed more? Return the answer in JSON format: {'song': 'more_streamed_song_name'}
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of data based on criterion (large integer).

function_sets.name: Music - 1 parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: albums_by_artist_1
functions.description: Returns all albums by a given artist.

functions.name: top_rated_albums
functions.description: Returns the top-rated albums based on average rating.

n.description: The number of albums to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: artist_by_album
functions.description: Returns the artist of an album by its name.

functions.name: albums_by_genres
functions.description: Retrieves a list of albums that contain any of the specified genres.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_1
functions.description: Retrieves all albums released on a specific date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs
functions.description: Returns the n most streamed songs.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all songs released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Returns the top 'n' songs sorted by their duration, from longest to shortest.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Returns the artist of the song.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_1
functions.description: Returns all songs by a given artist.

function_sets.name: Music - Multi(>1) parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: filter_albums_by_date_range
functions.description: Filters and retrieves albums released within a specified date range. The range is inclusive of the start and end dates.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: albums_by_genres2
functions.description: Retrieves albums that match specified inclusion and exclusion genre criteria.

genres_in.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

genres_out.description: A list of genre strings the albums must not contain.

functions.name: albums_by_date_and_genres
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year that match any of the specified genres.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: A list of genre strings to filter albums by.

functions.name: high_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums with an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums. Defaults to 4.0 if not specified.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by specific artist, sorted by number of streams.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness
functions.description: Retrieves songs that meet a specified danceability threshold and explicitness criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: albums_by_year_genres_and_descriptors
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, month, or year, that fit within specified genres and match given descriptors.

release_date.description: Release date to filter albums by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: List of genres to filter albums by.

descriptors.description: List of descriptors to match albums with.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that meet specific criteria of high average ratings, a minimum number of ratings, and a minimum number of reviews.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness_speechiness
functions.description: Retrieves songs based on specified thresholds for danceability, speechiness, and explicit content criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

speechiness_threshold.description: The minimum speechiness rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by a specific artist, released on a given date, month, or year.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

release_date.description: The release date of the songs to filter by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: unique_albums
functions.description: Finds albums that are distinctive in terms of genre diversity and artist collaboration but have lower average ratings.

genres_threshold.description: The minimum number of genres an album must cover.

artist_count_threshold.description: The minimum number of artists required to be involved in an album.

max_rating_threshold.description: The maximum average rating that an album can have.

functions.name: albums_by_dates_genres_rating
functions.description: Retrieves albums released within a specific date range, filtered by genres to include and exclude, and having an average rating above a specified minimum threshold.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

genre_in.description: List of genres that the albums must include.

genre_out.description: List of genres that the albums must not include.

min_rating.description: The minimum average rating threshold for the albums.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums_by_date
functions.description: Retrieves albums that exceed a certain rating threshold, have a minimum number of ratings and reviews, and are released on a specified date.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date_range
functions.description: Finds the top streamed songs by a specific artist within a given date range, and returns a specified number of these top songs.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: speechiness_songs
functions.description: Finds songs based on specific criteria of speechiness, energy, explicit content, and BPM, allowing a tolerance range for speechiness and energy values.

speechiness.description: Target threshold for speechiness with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

energy.description: Target threshold for energy with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

explicit.description: Flag indicating whether to filter for explicit content.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the speechiness and energy thresholds. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

functions.name: instrumental_songs
functions.description: Identifies songs based on specified levels of instrumentalness, valence, danceability, and BPM, with a tolerance range for each parameter.

instrumentalness.description: Target threshold for instrumentalness, with a specified deviation range.

valence.description: Target threshold for valence, with a specified deviation range.

danceability.description: Target threshold for danceability, with a specified deviation range.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the instrumentalness, valence, and danceability thresholds.

function_sets.name: Music - 1 parameter functions with complex function description, no examples.

functions.name: albums_by_artist_1
functions.description: Fetches the collection of music releases associated with a specific performer.

functions.name: top_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves the records of most favoured music releases ranked by their scores.

n.description: The number of albums to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: artist_by_album
functions.description: Fetches the singer who released a stated collection.

functions.name: albums_by_genres
functions.description: Retrieves a list of records that can be classified to be of the specified category/type.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_1
functions.description: Retrieves all collections launched during a particular timeframe.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs
functions.description: Retrieves the trendy tracks which the vast majority has been influenced by

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all musical pieces launched during a particular timeframe.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Retrieves the n highest-ranking tunes arranged by their length.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Fetches the performer who released a stated track.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_1
functions.description: Retrieves the music recordings that have been released by the specified singer.

function_sets.name: Music - one and multi parameter functions with elaborative function description, no examples.

functions.name: artist_info
functions.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specified artist, including attributes like name, band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist. Matches against the 'Name' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset.

functions.name: album_info
functions.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific album, covering attributes such as album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

album_name.description: The name of the album. Matches against the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: song_info
functions.description: Provides detailed information on a specific song, including track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, BPM, key, mode, danceability, valence, energy, acousticness, instrumentalness, liveness, speechiness, and duration in minutes.

song_name.description: The name of the song. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: albums_by_artist_2
functions.description: Retrieves all albums by a specific artist, searching through the 'artist_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search albums for. The search is performed within the 'artist_name' column, supporting partial matches.

functions.name: artists_by_genres
functions.description: Finds artists that match any of the specified genres, utilizing the 'genres' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset. It covers artist's name, is_band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

genres.description: List of genre strings to filter artists by. The filtering checks the 'genres' column for any matches.

functions.name: songs_by_album
functions.description: Retrieves all songs from a specific album, including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

album_name.description: The name of the album to find songs for. Matches against the 'album_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: max_rating_given_albums
functions.description: Finds the highest average rating from a list of specified albums. Returns the maximum average rating and the names of albums that share this rating. Relies on 'release_name' for album identification and 'avg_rating' for evaluation.

albums.description: A list of album names to evaluate. The function searches the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: sum_streams_given_songs
functions.description: Calculates the total number of streams for a specified list of songs. Accepts either a list of song names or a single comma-separated string of song names. Utilizes the 'track_name' for song identification and 'streams' for summing.

songs.description: A list of song names, or a single string of comma-separated song names, to calculate total streams for. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: highest_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that have an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings. Filters based on 'avg_rating' and 'rating_count' columns, providing detailed album information.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating albums must meet to be included. Searches the 'avg_rating' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have to be considered. Filters using the 'rating_count' column.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_2
functions.description: Retrieves all albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date, searching through the 'release_date' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_2
functions.description: Retrieves all songs by a specific artist, searching through the 'artist(s)_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset,  including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search songs for. The search is performed within the 'artist(s)_name' column, supporting partial matches.
